structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Prevention of spillage from trucks hauling coal.
law.text: All trucks hauling coal on a fully controlled limited access highway shall be covered by a tarp or equivalent cover to prevent spillage.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 415, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988.
